author: manunlp
content: In [Constructing `SignedExecutionProof`](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/master/specs/_features/eip8025/prover.md#constructing-signedexecutionproof), any reason why the `parent_beacon_block_root` has to be extracted from `state.latest_block_header.parent_root` instead of directly from `beacon_block.parent_root`?

author: jih2nn
content: Not sure why. After guessing about any reason, I think it's just an oversight. Let me make a PR that changes it.
